src:
Očajni Flenzburg udara na strašne pariske Milionere
​Nemački šampion dočekuje favorizovni Pari Sen Žermen na startu sedmog kola rukometne Lige šampiona. Najbolji strelac domaćina u evro eliti Geran Johanesen povredio se proteklog vikenda u Bundesligi

06 Nov 2019

Barselona je prošle nedelje protutnjala kroz Flenzburg, a nemački prvak posle samo sedam dana dočekuje drugog velikog favorita u Grupi A Pari Sen Žermen u prvom meču sedmog kola rukometne Lige šampiona. Moćni pariski Milioneri dominiraju u Francuskoj, dok u evro eliti imaju samo jedan poraz, i to u Blaugrani od Barse.
Flenzburg je u očajnoj formi ove sezone. Odlazak najboljeg igrača, Danca Rasmusa Lauge u Vesprem pokazao se kao nenadoknadiv gubitak za tim sa Baltika. U Ligi šampiona najbolji nemački tim ima dva uzastopna poraza, a ni u Bundesligi mu ne cvetaju ruže.
Proteklog vikenda, Flenzburg je odigrao samo 23:23 u Štutgartu protiv ekipe koja je u donjem delu tabele. Osim gubitka boda veći problem na tom susretu bila je povreda najboljeg strelca tima Gerana Johanesena. On je povredio članak već na startu meča i do kraja nije ulazio u igri. Njegovo učešće u meču sa Barselonom je pod znakom pitanja. Norveški bek je sa 33 golova najefikasniji igrač nemačkog tima u Ligi šampiona.
Parižani imaju najskuplju ekipu na svetu već nekoliko godina, ali i dalje čekaju na pehar najboljeg tima Starog kontinenta. Od povreda su se oporavili asovi Mikel Hansen i Sander Sagosen. Danac i Norvežanin su prošlog vikenda sa šest odnosno pet golova bili najbolji u ubedljivoj pobedi na svom terenu protiv Alborga sa čak 13 golova razlike (37:24).




PSŽ PRVI FAVORIT, FLENZBURG OSMI







U međusobnim susretima, PSŽ ima tri pobede u nizu. Poslednji put pariski Milioneri su pobedili Flenzburg prošle sezone u Ligi šampiona kada je bilo ubedljivih 27:20 na severu Nemačke. U prvom meču u Parizu, francuski prvak je slavio sa 29:27. Kvalitet je na strani gostiju i očekuje se pobeda izabranika španskog stručnjaka Raula Gonzaleza.
U prvom meču dana, Dinamo iz Bukurešta je favorit na svom terenu protiv švajcarskog šampiona Kadetena. Rumuni igraju odlično, nemaju još poraz i blizu su prve nokaut faze takmičenje. Prošle nedelje je u prestonici Rumunije razbijena Visla sa 29:20. Za ekipu iz Bukurešta nosioci igre su afrički rukometaši, a ističu se desni bek iz Tunisa Amine Banur i njegov zemljak Kamel Aloini. U ekipi je i srpski reprezentativac Stefan Vujić.
Sistem takmičenja u Ligi šampiona je isti kao i prethodne sezone. Iz prve dve grupe najbolji tim ide direktno u četvrtfinale, dok ekipe od drugog do šestog mesta odlaze u osminu finala. Iz slabijih grupa C i D po dva najbolja tima igraće u baražu za osminu finala.
Titulu brani Vardar koji je prošle sezone u Kelnu pobedio u finalu Vesprem.

text:
Desperate Flensburg hits the dreaded Paris millionaires
The German champion welcomes the favored Paris Saint-Germain at the start of the seventh round of the Handball Champions League. Euroleague top scorer Geran Johanesen injured last weekend in Bundesliga

06 Nov 2019

Barcelona swept through Flensburg last week, with the German champion after just seven days welcoming another big favorite in Group A Paris Saint-Germain in the first leg of the seventh round of the Champions League handball. Powerful Paris millionaires dominate France, while the Euro elite have only one defeat, in Blaugrana by Barca.
Flensburg is in desperate shape this season. The departure of the best player, Dan Rasmus Lauga to Veszprém proved to be an irresistible loss for the team from the Baltic. In the Champions League the best German team has two consecutive defeats, and in the Bundesliga it does not bloom with roses.
Last weekend, Flensburg played just 23:23 in Stuttgart against a team that is in the bottom of the table. In addition to losing a point, a major problem in that match was the injury to the team's top scorer Geran Johannesen. He injured the article at the start of the match and did not enter the game until the end. His involvement in the match with Barcelona is questionable. The 33-goal Norwegian midfielder is the most efficient player on the German Champions League team.
The Parisians have the most expensive team in the world for several years, but they are still waiting for the cup of the best team of the Old Continent. Aces Mikel Hansen and Sander Sagosen have recovered from their injuries. The Danish and Norwegian last weekend with six and five goals respectively, were the best in a convincing win on their home ground against Aalborg with as many as 13 goals difference (37:24).




PSG FIRST FAVORITE, FLENZBURG EIGHT







In the match, PSG has three wins in a row. The last time the Paris Millionaires defeated Flensburg last season in the Champions League was 27:20 in the north of Germany. In the first match in Paris, the French champion celebrated with 29:27. The quality is on the guest side and Spanish expert Raul Gonzalez is expected to win.
In the first match of the day, Dinamo from Bucharest is the favorite in their field against the Swiss champion Cadeten. Romanians play great, have no defeat yet and are close to the first knockout phase of the competition. Last week, Wisla was broken in the Romanian capital with 29:20. For the Bucharest team, the winners of the game are African handball players, with the right-back from Tunisia Amina Banur and his countryman Kamel Aloini. The team also includes Serbian national team player Stefan Vujic.
The Champions League competition system is the same as in the previous season. From the first two groups the best team goes directly to the quarterfinals, while the teams from second to sixth go to the eighth finals. From the weaker C and D groups, the top two teams will each play in the eighth finals.
The title is defended by Vardar, who won the Veszprém final in Cologne last season.
